resources.string: It has been detected that you are not connected to a wifi connection. The content to be downloaded is approximately <SIZE> MB. Press “Close” to close the app and restart it once you have enabled your Wi-Fi connection.\n\nAlternatively, press “Start” to begin downloading the content on the current connection.
Updates to the content are now available!\n\nDo you want to download now?
Downloading content in the background: This may take several minutes.
Some of the content failed to download.\n\nRetry now?
No Network Connection Found.\n\nThis is required to download content before you can use the app. Please connect your device and restart My Smart Hands.

You are about to download the content for this app. Download size is approximately <SIZE> MB and therefore use of a wifi connection is recomended. \n\n Please select the storage you would like to use:
No disk with sufficient available space found. Please make room for the <SIZE> MB content (required) on the drive you wish to store it.
